aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Income Tax Obligations and Uncertainties
Amazon is subject to income taxes in the U.S. federal jurisdiction.
Amazon is subject to income taxes in U.S. state jurisdictions.
Amazon is subject to income taxes in numerous foreign jurisdictions.
Tax laws may be subject to significant change due to economic conditions.
Tax laws may be subject to significant change due to political conditions.
Tax laws may be subject to significant change due to other conditions.
Tax regulations may be subject to significant change with or without notice.
Tax administrative practices may be subject to significant change.
Tax principles may be subject to significant change.
Tax interpretations in various jurisdictions may be subject to significant change.
Significant judgment is required in evaluating taxes.
Significant judgment is required in estimating tax provisions.
Significant judgment is required in estimating tax accruals.
Many transactions occur during ordinary course of business with uncertain tax determinations.
Amazon's actual earnings are subject to change due to economic conditions.
Amazon's actual earnings are subject to change due to political conditions.
Amazon's actual earnings are subject to change due to other conditions.
Amazon's forecasted earnings are subject to change due to economic conditions.
Amazon's forecasted earnings are subject to change due to political conditions.
Amazon's forecasted earnings are subject to change due to other conditions.
Significant judgment is required in determining Amazon's ability to use its deferred tax assets.

/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Managementâ€™s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/

text:
#### Income Taxes

We are subject to income taxes in the U.S. (federal and state) and numerous foreign jurisdictions. Tax laws, regulations, administrative practices, principles, and interpretations in various jurisdictions may be subject to significant change, with or without notice, due to economic, political, and other conditions, and significant judgment is required in evaluating and estimating our provision and accruals for these taxes. There are many transactions that occur during the ordinary course of business for which the ultimate tax determination is uncertain. In addition, our actual and forecasted earnings are subject to change due to economic, political, and other conditions and significant judgment is required in determining our ability to use our deferred tax assets.
